StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the model of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the model of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManufacturerInfo
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the version of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the version of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceID
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature stores a camera identifier.
StringReg.Description: This feature stores a camera identifier.

StringReg.Name: DeviceUserID
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature stores a user-programmable identifier.
StringReg.Description: This feature stores a user-programmable identifier.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature specifies the scan type of the sensor.
Enumeration.Description: This feature specifies the scan type of the sensor.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: This command is used to reset the device and to put it in its power up state. This will reset both the IP Engine and the camera head.
Command.Description: This command is used to reset the device and to put it in its power up state. This will reset both the IP Engine and the camera head.

Command.Name: CameraHeadReset
Command.ToolTip: This command resets the camera's circuitry. The IP Engine does not reset. NOTE: After the camera has been reset, the user should issue a UserSetLoad command.
Command.Description: This command resets the camera's circuitry. The IP Engine does not reset. NOTE: After the camera has been reset, the user should issue a UserSetLoad command.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: SensorDigitizationTaps
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature represents the number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.
Enumeration.Description: This feature represents the number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the maximum width (in pixels) of the image after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimensions of the image.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the maximum width (in pixels) of the image after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimensions of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the maximum height (in pixels) of the image after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimensions of the image.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the maximum height (in pixels) of the image after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimensions of the image.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the actual image width expelled by the camera of the master AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: This feature represents the actual image width expelled by the camera of the master AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the actual image height expelled by the camera of the master AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: This feature represents the actual image height expelled by the camera of the master AOI (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontal
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature represents the number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells that must be combined (added) together. Note that the user has to set the Width feature accordingly.
Enumeration.Description: This feature represents the number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells that must be combined (added) together. Note that the user has to set the Width feature accordingly.

Enumeration.Name: BinningVertical
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature represents the number of vertical photo-sensitive cells that must be combined (added) together. Note that the user has to set the Height feature accordingly.
Enumeration.Description: This feature represents the number of vertical photo-sensitive cells that must be combined (added) together. Note that the user has to set the Height feature accordingly.

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature is used to flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: This feature is used to flip horizontally the image sent by the device.

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature is used to flip vertically the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: This feature is used to flip vertically the image sent by the device.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the format of the pixel to use during the acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the format of the pixel to use during the acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: PixelCoding
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the coding of the pixels in the image.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the coding of the pixels in the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the total size in bits of a pixel of the image.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the total size in bits of a pixel of the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the type of color filter that is applied to the image.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the type of color filter that is applied to the image.

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the horizontal offset from the origin to the master AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: This feature represents the horizontal offset from the origin to the master AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the vertical offset from the origin to the master AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: This feature represents the vertical offset from the origin to the master AOI (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: CameraSpeed
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects the camera speed.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects the camera speed.

Boolean.Name: ConstantFrameRate
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature enables the frame rate to remain constant and independent of the AOI size.
Boolean.Description: This feature enables the frame rate to remain constant and independent of the AOI size.

Boolean.Name: CenterScanMode
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature enables the sub-sampled center scan mode.
Boolean.Description: This feature enables the sub-sampled center scan mode.

Enumeration.Name: BitShift
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects the number of bits to shift in the data output.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects the number of bits to shift in the data output.

Boolean.Name: NegativeImage
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature inverts the image from positive to negative.
Boolean.Description: This feature inverts the image from positive to negative.

Boolean.Name: ProgFrameTimeEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature enables the programmable frame time mode. In this mode, the user can extend the actual frame time beyond the free-running frame time.
Boolean.Description: This feature enables the programmable frame time mode. In this mode, the user can extend the actual frame time beyond the free-running frame time.

Integer.Name: ProgFrameTimeAbs
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the actual frame time in units of uSeconds.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the actual frame time in units of uSeconds.

Boolean.Name: ProgLineTimeEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature enables the programmable line time mode. In this mode, the user can extend the actual line time beyond the free-running line time.
Boolean.Description: This feature enables the programmable line time mode. In this mode, the user can extend the actual line time beyond the free-running line time.

Integer.Name: ProgLineTimeAbs
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the actual line time in pixels.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the actual line time in pixels.

Integer.Name: CurrentFrameRate
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the current frame rate in integer units of frames per second. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the current frame rate in integer units of frames per second. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: GetCurrentRate
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the current frame rate and frame count.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the current frame rate and frame count.

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects the type of test image that is expelled by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects the type of test image that is expelled by the camera.

Boolean.Name: SuperImposeLinesEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature enables H and V lines to be superimposed over the live image when the TestImageSelector = SuperImposedLines.
Boolean.Description: This feature enables H and V lines to be superimposed over the live image when the TestImageSelector = SuperImposedLines.

Boolean.Name: SuperImposeCrossEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature enables a center cross to be superimposed over the live image when the TestImageSelector = SuperImposedLines.
Boolean.Description: This feature enables a center cross to be superimposed over the live image when the TestImageSelector = SuperImposedLines.

Integer.Name: SuperImposeIntensity
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the intensity level of lines/cross to be superimposed over the live image.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the intensity level of lines/cross to be superimposed over the live image.

Integer.Name: SuperImposeLineH1
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the vertical position of the top horizontal line to be superimposed over the live image.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the vertical position of the top horizontal line to be superimposed over the live image.

Integer.Name: SuperImposeLineH2
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the vertical position of the bottom horizontal line to be superimposed over the live image.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the vertical position of the bottom horizontal line to be superimposed over the live image.

Integer.Name: SuperImposeLineV1
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the horizontal position of the left vertical line to be superimposed over the live image.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the horizontal position of the left vertical line to be superimposed over the live image.

Integer.Name: SuperImposeLineV2
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the horizontal position of the right vertical line to be superimposed over the live image.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the horizontal position of the right vertical line to be superimposed over the live image.

Integer.Name: TestRegister
Integer.ToolTip: This feature accesses a general purpose test register.
Integer.Description: This feature accesses a general purpose test register.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature controls the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature controls the acquisition mode of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: This feature starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: This feature starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: This feature stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: This feature stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: This feature provides the number of frames to be acquired in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: This feature provides the number of frames to be acquired in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This features enables the Trigger mode of operation.
Enumeration.Description: This features enables the Trigger mode of operation.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: This is a command that can be used by an application to generate an internal trigger when TriggerSource is set to Software.
Command.Description: This is a command that can be used by an application to generate an internal trigger when TriggerSource is set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects the source of the trigger when TriggerMode is On.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects the source of the trigger when TriggerMode is On.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects the triggering edge.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects the triggering edge.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerOverlap
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature specifies the type of trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame.
Enumeration.Description: This feature specifies the type of trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame.

Integer.Name: TriggerDelayRaw
Integer.ToolTip: This feature specifies the delay in uSeconds to apply after the trigger reception before effectively activating it.
Integer.Description: This feature specifies the delay in uSeconds to apply after the trigger reception before effectively activating it.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerType
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects the trigger's mode of operation.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects the trigger's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: TriggerFilter
Integer.ToolTip: This feature specifies the filter period ( in uSeconds ) of the trigger signal.
Integer.Description: This feature specifies the filter period ( in uSeconds ) of the trigger signal.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerDebounce
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature specifies the debounce period of the trigger signal.
Enumeration.Description: This feature specifies the debounce period of the trigger signal.

Integer.Name: TriggerNumFrames
Integer.ToolTip: This feature selects the number of frames delivered after every trigger signal. A value of 65532 sets it to Continuous.
Integer.Description: This feature selects the number of frames delivered after every trigger signal. A value of 65532 sets it to Continuous.

Integer.Name: TriggerNumPulses
Integer.ToolTip: This feature selects the number of trigger pulses used during a single trigger sequence when TriggerType is set to FrameAccumulation.
Integer.Description: This feature selects the number of trigger pulses used during a single trigger sequence when TriggerType is set to FrameAccumulation.

Integer.Name: TriggerPeriod
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the period ( in uSeconds ) of the received External Trigger signal.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the period ( in uSeconds ) of the received External Trigger signal.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature is used to set the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: This feature is used to set the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

Integer.Name: ExposureTimeRaw
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is used to set the Exposure time in units of uSeconds when ExposureMode is Timed ( and AEC is disabled ).
Integer.Description: This feature is used to set the Exposure time in units of uSeconds when ExposureMode is Timed ( and AEC is disabled ).

Integer.Name: CurrentExposure
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the current exposure time in uSeconds. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the current exposure time in uSeconds. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: MaxExposure
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MAX exposure time in uSec. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MAX exposure time in uSec. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: GetCurrentFrameSize
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the current vertical and horizontal image frame size in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the current vertical and horizontal image frame size in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: GetMinMaxHorizSize
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MIN and MAX horizontal image frame size in pixels.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MIN and MAX horizontal image frame size in pixels.

Integer.Name: GetMinMaxVertSize
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MIN and MAX vertical image frame size in lines.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MIN and MAX vertical image frame size in lines.

Integer.Name: GetLineTime
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MIN line time in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MIN line time in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: FRM_TIM_ACT
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MAX exposure time in uSec. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MAX exposure time in uSec. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: FRR_EXP_MIN
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MIN exposure time in uSec. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MIN exposure time in uSec. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: FRM_TIM_MIN
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MIN frame time in uSec. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MIN frame time in uSec. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: LIN_TIM_MIN
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MIN line time in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MIN line time in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: MIN_HRZ_SZE
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MIN value of the horizontal image frame size in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MIN value of the horizontal image frame size in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: MAX_HRZ_SZE
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MAX value of the horizontal image frame size in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MAX value of the horizontal image frame size in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: MIN_VER_SZE
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MIN vertical image frame size in lines. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MIN vertical image frame size in lines. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: MAX_VER_SZE
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the MAX vertical image frame size in lines. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the MAX vertical image frame size in lines. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: CUR_HRZ_SZE
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the current horizontal image frame size in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the current horizontal image frame size in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: CUR_VER_SZE
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the current vertical image frame size in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the current vertical image frame size in pixels. This is a dynamic value that changes as a function of the camera's mode of operation.

Integer.Name: GetCamAttributes
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the attributes ( ie. number of taps and FFC support ) of the camera.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the attributes ( ie. number of taps and FFC support ) of the camera.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects which tap is controlled by the various Analog Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects which tap is controlled by the various Analog Gain features.

Enumeration.Name: GainAutoBalance
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature is used to perform automatic gain balancing between the sensor taps ( when AGC is disabled ).
Enumeration.Description: This feature is used to perform automatic gain balancing between the sensor taps ( when AGC is disabled ).

Integer.Name: GainRaw
Integer.ToolTip: This feature controls the selected analog gain as a raw integer value ( when AGC is disabled ).
Integer.Description: This feature controls the selected analog gain as a raw integer value ( when AGC is disabled ).

Integer.Name: AnalogGain_Ch1
Integer.ToolTip: This feature controls the Analog Gain for tap #1.
Integer.Description: This feature controls the Analog Gain for tap #1.

Integer.Name: AnalogGain_Ch2
Integer.ToolTip: This feature controls the Analog Gain for tap #2.
Integer.Description: This feature controls the Analog Gain for tap #2.

Integer.Name: CurrentTap2Gain
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the current analog gain value for tap #2. This value changes automaticallly when GainAutoBalance or AGC are enabled.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the current analog gain value for tap #2. This value changes automaticallly when GainAutoBalance or AGC are enabled.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects which tap is controlled by the various Black Level features.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects which tap is controlled by the various Black Level features.

Integer.Name: BlackLevelRaw
Integer.ToolTip: This feature controls the analog black level as a raw integer value ( when AGC is disabled ).

To calculate the negative temperature subtract 255 from the value. For example, a value of 254 indicates a temperature of 255-254 = -1 degree C.

To calculate the negative temperature subtract 255 from the value. For example, a value of 254 indicates a temperature of 255-254 = -1 degree C.
